title: *NO FEE* Huge 2 bed 2 bath w/porch, fully renovated for 9/1!
posting_body: Rent Includes:: Garbage, Heat, Hot Water, Water
*NO FEE* Huge 2 bed 2 bath w/ porch, fully renovated for 9/1!
Heat/hot water included in the rent.
The parking areas are currently under renovation.
Street parking only until they are completed.
Once completed you can rent a parking spot for $150 per month*
*This apartment will go vacant on Aug 1 and will be renovated during August for a Sept 1 move-in date.
Pics are from a different unit in the same building.
Brand new SS appliances (fridge, micro, DW and stove), new white cabinets and quartz c-tops.
Rent directly through management and pay NO BROKER FEES!!
IF YOU ARE REPLYING THROUGH CL, PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR ACTUAL EMAIL ADDRESS IN REPLY
Micozzi Management 159 Cambridge St Allston MA 02134
Micozzi Management owns and professionally manages all of our buildings.
If this isnt exactly what you are looking for, follow the link below to check out our other apartment options.

As an equal opportunity housing provider, Micozzi Management provides housing opportunities regardless of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, physical or mental disability, familial status or any other classification protected by applicable federal, state or local law.
106-116 Tremont are professionally managed buildings in the Oak Square neighborhood of Brighton.
The location is fabulous, right on the Newton line.
The local 57 bus goes right by the building, as well as the 501/503 express buses(which go downtown and to Copley Sq).
The Mass Pike is a quick 3 minute drive.
A quick walk into Oak Sq, enjoy the YMCA, Dunkin Donuts and many other places for entertaining.
Tenants here enjoy free heat and hot water included in the rent.
All apartments have terrific closet space.
There is laundry on site and an elevator in the building.
